name: Unchained
title: The Average Crypto Trader Loses Money - Bits + Bips w/ Sal Ternullo
text:
Synopsis
The average crypto trader consistently loses money by buying at peak sentiment moments and being on the wrong side of trades, while whales capitalize by selling during market rallies.

Key Insights
- Most crypto traders lose money in the market
- Traders typically buy at peak sentiment periods (November-December)
- Market rallies are often triggered by specific events like:
  - Gendler's resignation
  - Paul Atkins nomination
  - David Saaks nomination
- Whales strategically sell during these market rallies
- The market is expected to continue declining for several months
- Clarity on an upcoming executive order is anticipated to be a potential market inflection point
